sections.title: Why build your own real-time communication platform?
sections.content:
Off-the-shelf video conferencing tools offer broad functionality but often fall short when specific industry requirements or unique collaboration styles are needed. Building your own real-time communication (RTC) platform provides unparalleled control over features, security, and user experience, ensuring it perfectly aligns with your operational demands.

Generic platforms come with limitations like rigid user interfaces, data privacy concerns, and unnecessary features that can complicate workflows. With Kliv, you can design a system that integrates seamlessly with your existing infrastructure, offering a focused and highly secure communication environment without recurring subscription burdens or feature bloat. This approach allows for a truly customized solution, enhancing productivity and delivering a superior user experience tailored to your precise context.

sections.title: The case for custom real-time communication solutions
sections.content:
## Limitations of standard communication tools

Existing real-time communication (RTC) tools, while widely adopted, present significant drawbacks for businesses and organizations seeking truly optimized solutions. These often include:

- **Generic Feature Sets**: Built for a broad audience, they include features you don't need and lack critical ones you do.
- **Data Privacy & Security Concerns**: Sensitive interactions might be processed on third-party servers, raising compliance and confidentiality risks.
- **Integration Challenges**: Difficulty connecting with proprietary systems, CRMs, or specialized industry software.
- **Scalability & Performance**: Shared infrastructure can lead to performance issues during peak times or as your user base grows.
- **Branding & User Experience**: Limited customization options mean your communication tools don't reflect your brand identity or provide an intuitive experience for your specific users.
- **Subscription Costs**: Recurring fees can become substantial, especially when scaling up.

## Advantages of a custom-built RTC platform

Leveraging platforms like Kliv to build your own RTC solution offers a strategic advantage:

### Tailored Functionality
Design features that directly address your unique workflows. Whether it's specialized annotation tools for remote design, HIPAA-compliant patient consultations, or interactive polling for virtual events, your platform will do exactly what you need.

### Enhanced Security & Data Control
Host your communication infrastructure on your own servers or preferred cloud environment, ensuring full control over data residency and robust security protocols. This is crucial for industries like finance, healthcare, and government.

### Seamless Integration
Native integration with your existing internal systems (e.g., LMS, EHR, CRM) eliminates manual data entry and improves workflow efficiency, providing a unified operational experience.

### Optimized Performance & Scalability
Build a system designed to scale precisely with your user demands, ensuring low latency and high quality for all interactions, regardless of participant numbers or concurrent sessions.

### Brand Consistency
Fully customize the user interface and experience to align with your brand guidelines, creating a cohesive and professional presence for your users.

### Cost Efficiency
Invest once in a solution perfectly suited to your needs, avoiding perpetual subscriptions for features you don't use or require.

## Real-world applications of custom RTC

A custom RTC platform can revolutionize operations across various sectors:

**Healthcare**: Secure telehealth platforms enabling virtual consultations, remote patient monitoring, and collaborative diagnostic sessions with integrated EHR access.

**Education**: Interactive virtual classrooms with breakout rooms, shared whiteboards, real-time quizzes, and direct integration with learning management systems (LMS).

**Legal**: Encrypted client-attorney video calls, secure document sharing for depositions, and private virtual courtrooms with digital evidence presentation tools.

**Financial Services**: Secure client advisory calls, real-time trading floor communication, and compliance-recorded meetings with integrated CRM data.

**Manufacturing & Field Service**: Remote assistance tools allowing experts to guide on-site technicians via augmented reality overlays and shared schematics.

## The acceleration of AI-powered development

AI-driven platforms like Kliv demystify custom software development, enabling rapid creation of complex systems like RTC platforms:

- **Natural Language Interaction**: Describe your desired features and AI translates them into functional code.
- **Component Generation**: AI can instantly generate UI components, backend logic, and API integrations.
- **Automated Testing**: Built-in AI-powered testing ensures robust and reliable performance.
- **Real-time Collaboration**: AI assists in structuring the platform, suggesting optimal architectures for scalability and performance.

Building your own real-time communication platform is no longer reserved for tech giants. With Kliv, you can deliver a communication solution that genuinely serves your organizational purpose, enhances security, and provides a superior, tailored experience.

sections.title: Frequently asked questions about building RTC with Kliv

items.answer: Building a basic proof-of-concept RTC platform can be achieved in a matter of hours or days with Kliv. More complex, enterprise-grade solutions with custom integrations and advanced features might take a few weeks.
items.question: How long does it take to develop a custom RTC platform?

items.answer: No prior coding experience is necessary. Kliv's AI-powered platform allows you to describe your desired features in plain language, and it generates the underlying code and infrastructure. Technical details are handled by the AI.
items.question: Do I need coding expertise to build an RTC platform on Kliv?

items.answer: Yes, our platform makes it easy to integrate with a wide range of existing systems like CRMs (Salesforce), EHRs, LMS, HRIS, and other communication protocols. You can specify your integration needs, and the AI will help implement them.
items.question: Can my custom RTC platform integrate with my existing business systems?

items.answer: You retain full ownership of the source code, data, and intellectual property. The application is entirely yours, giving you complete control over its deployment, security, and future development.
items.question: Who owns the intellectual property and data of the built application?

items.answer: The initial investment for a custom build can be higher than a monthly SaaS subscription. However, custom solutions eliminate recurring fees, often becoming more cost-effective within 1-2 years, especially when considering features, integrations, and scalability not available in off-the-shelf products.
items.question: How does the cost compare to off-the-shelf video conferencing services?

items.answer: Your custom RTC platform can be deployed on a variety of cloud providers (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) or even on-premise, depending on your security, compliance, and scalability requirements, giving you full data residency control.
items.question: Where will my custom RTC platform be hosted?

items.answer: Absolutely. Custom-built platforms offer complete flexibility. You can continuously iterate, add new features, modify existing ones, and scale the application as your business needs evolve, without vendor lock-in.
items.question: Can I modify or expand the platform after it's initially built?

items.answer: Kliv provides AI-driven assistance throughout the development process, including troubleshooting, optimization suggestions, and best practice recommendations. For ongoing maintenance or complex feature additions, you have the option to engage developers or continue using Kliv as your development environment.
